Button

The button is a concatenation of four images: normal state, state with the mouse cursor on it, state with the mouse button pressed, and state with the mouse button disabled.



CheckBox

A checkbox is a combination of four images: unchecked normal state, unchecked state with the mouse cursor on it, checked normal state, and checked state with the mouse cursor on it.



Progress bar

A progress bar is a concatenation of two or three images: the bar base, the bar, and the disabled state (if necessary).



Slider

The slider is an image of only the bar base.
The knob part has the same format as the button.
